title: Awesome List Updates on Mar 10, 2023
_seo_title: Awesome List Updates on Mar 10, 2023 - Track Awesome List

items.title: Awesome Game Engine Dev
items.content_text:
### Game Engines / Popular

*   🎉 [Godot (⭐99k)](https://github.com/godotengine/godot#readme) 🔥 - Feature-packed, open source engine. Excellent! \[[Awesome (⭐8.2k)](https://github.com/godotengine/awesome-godot#readme) | [Website](https://godotengine.org)]

### Game Engines / AAA

*   🎉 [Amazon Lumberyard (⭐2.1k)](https://github.com/aws/lumberyard) - AAA engine integrated with AWS and Twitch. Forked from *CRYENGINE*.
*   💸 [CRYENGINE](https://www.cryengine.com) - Powerful real-time game development platform by *Crytek*.
*   🆓 [Evergine](https://evergine.com) - High-quality 3D and 2D solutions. Formerly *Wave Engine*. \[[Samples (⭐130)](https://github.com/EvergineTeam/Samples)]
*   🎉 [O3DE (⭐8.4k)](https://github.com/o3de/o3de/) - Multi-platform AAA engine. Cinema-quality 3D. Successor to *Lumberyard*.

### Game Engines / Commercial

*   💰 [AppGameKit](https://www.appgamekit.com/studio) - Easy and quick game making by *TheGameCreators*.
*   💰 [Corgi Engine](https://corgi-engine.moremountains.com/) - 2D/2.5D platformer engine built on top of *Unity*.
*   🎉 [Defold (⭐5.3k)](https://github.com/defold/defold) - Open sourced game engine by *King*. \[[Website](https://defold.com)]
*   💸 [Felgo](https://felgo.com/games) - Build cross-platform 2D games in days, built with *Qt*.
*   💰 [GameGuru](https://www.game-guru.com/) - Game builder, 3D, no coding required by *TheGameCreators*.
*   💸 [GameMaker Studio](https://www.yoyogames.com/en/gamemaker) - Popular 2D game development environment by *YoYo Games*.
*   💰 [Phaser Editor 2D](https://phasereditor2d.com) - Commercial, web-based editor for *Phaser*. \[[GitHub (⭐467)](https://github.com/PhaserEditor2D/PhaserEditor2D-v3)]

### Game Engines / Specialty

*   💰 [3dSen](https://geod.itch.io/3dnes) - Emulator that lets you play *NES* games in 3D. \[[Website](http://www.geodstudio.net)]
*   🎉 [GB Studio (⭐8.9k)](https://github.com/chrismaltby/gb-studio) - Retro adventure game creator for *Game Boy*.
*   💰 [Platforming Engine](https://robvansaaze.itch.io/platforming-engine) - Everything you need to create your own platformer in *GameMaker*.
*   💰 [RPG in a Box](https://www.rpginabox.com) - Turn your stories and ideas into games, built with *Godot*.

### Learning / Computer Graphics

*   Platform: XNA
    *   📚 [RB Whitaker's Wiki](http://rbwhitaker.wikidot.com/) - Tutorials on C#, MonoGame, XNA, and more.
    *   📚 [Riemer's MonoGame Tutorials (⭐765)](https://github.com/SimonDarksideJ/XNAGameStudio/wiki/RiemersArchiveOverview) - Everything you need to start programming with MonoGame.
    *   📚 [XNA Game Studio Archive (⭐765)](https://github.com/SimonDarksideJ/XNAGameStudio) 🔥 - Required visit for [MonoGame](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/MonoGame) / [FNA](https://fna-xna.github.io/) / [XNA](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Microsoft_XNA) developers.

### Libraries / BASIC

*   BASIC: App Framework
    *   💰 [Basic for Qt](https://www.q7basic.org/index.html) - BASIC language and environment built with *Qt*. Formerly *Q7Basic*.
    *   🎉 [QB64 (⭐688)](https://github.com/QB64Team/qb64) - Modern BASIC+OpenGL language, retains *QBasic* / *QB4.5* compatibility.
    *   📚 [Visual Basic](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/visual-basic/) - Object-oriented language for Windows by *Microsoft*.

### Libraries / C

*   C: App Framework
    *   🎉 [glfw (⭐14k)](https://github.com/glfw/glfw) - Cross-platform API for windowing, graphics contexts, input and events.
    *   🎉 [MiniFB (⭐1.1k)](https://github.com/emoon/minifb) - Creates a cross-platform frame buffer for drawing pixels.
    *   🎉 [SDL (⭐13k)](https://github.com/libsdl-org/SDL) 🔥 - Low level access to audio, keyboard, mouse, joystick, and graphics hardware.
    *   🎉 [Sokol (⭐8.4k)](https://github.com/floooh/sokol) 🔥 - Single-file libraries for graphics, windowing, file handling, audio and more.
*   C: Audio
    *   ⭐ [Miniaudio (⭐4.8k)](https://github.com/mackron/miniaudio) - Single-file audio playback and capture library.
    *   🎉 [SDL\_mixer (⭐532)](https://github.com/libsdl-org/SDL_mixer) - Audio mixer that supports various file formats for SDL.
    *   🎉 [SoLoud (⭐2k)](https://github.com/jarikomppa/soloud) 🔥 - Free, easy, portable audio engine for games.
*   C: Game Framework
    *   🎉 [CGL (⭐441)](https://github.com/Jaysmito101/cgl) - Single-header file, lots of graphics & utility functions.
    *   🎉 [DOME (⭐482)](https://github.com/domeengine/dome) - Melds SDL2 and the Wren scripting language. \[[Website](https://domeengine.com/)]
    *   🎉 [Entrypoint (⭐71)](https://github.com/jimon/entrypoint) - Lightweight entry point for games.
    *   ⭐ [FWK (⭐517)](https://github.com/r-lyeh/FWK) - 3D game framework.
    *   🎉 [Gunslinger (⭐1.4k)](https://github.com/MrFrenik/gunslinger) - Header-only C99 framework for multimedia apps.
    *   🎉 [RayLib (⭐27k)](https://github.com/raysan5/raylib) 🔥 - Simple and easy-to-use library to enjoy 2D/3D videogame programming.
*   C: Libraries
    *   ⭐ [Cute Headers (⭐4.7k)](https://github.com/RandyGaul/cute_headers) - Single-file libraries primarily used for games, by [Randy Gaul](https://github.com/RandyGaul).
    *   ⭐ [Libs (⭐1.9k)](https://github.com/mattiasgustavsson/libs) - Single-file public domain libraries for C/C++, by [Mattias Gustavsson](https://github.com/mattiasgustavsson).
    *   ⭐ [Pico Headers (⭐383)](https://github.com/empyreanx/pico_headers) - Single-file, cross-platform libraries for game development.
    *   📚 [Single-file Libs (⭐9.4k)](https://github.com/nothings/single_file_libs) - Amazing collection of single-file C/C++ libraries compiled from many authors.
    *   ⭐ [stb (⭐29k)](https://github.com/nothings/stb) 🔥 - Single-file public domain libraries for C/C++, by [Sean Barrett](https://github.com/nothings).

### Libraries / C++

*   📚 [Learn C++](https://www.learncpp.com) 🔥 - Walks you through all the steps to write, compile, and debug C++.
*   C++: App Framework
    *   🎉 [Cinder (⭐5.4k)](https://github.com/cinder/Cinder) - App / graphics library for macOS, Windows, Linux, iOS. \[[Website](https://libcinder.org)]
    *   🎉 [Cross Window (⭐686)](https://github.com/alaingalvan/CrossWindow) - Platform library for managing windows and other OS tasks.
    *   🎉 [SFML (⭐11k)](https://github.com/SFML/SFML) 🔥 - Cross-platform access to windowing, graphics, audio and networking.
*   C++: Layout
    *   🎉 [Yoga (⭐18k)](https://github.com/facebook/yoga) - Cross-platform [flexbox](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/CSS_Flexible_Box_Layout/Basic_Concepts_of_Flexbox) layout engine by *Facebook*. \[[Website](https://yogalayout.com/)]
*   C++: Scripting
    *   🎉 [AngelScript](http://www.angelcode.com/angelscript/) - Cross-platform scripting library, follows the widely known syntax of C/C++.
    *   🔒 [ArkScript (⭐648)](https://github.com/ArkScript-lang/Ark) - Small, fast, functional and scripting language.
    *   🎉 [ChaiScript (⭐3k)](https://github.com/ChaiScript/ChaiScript) - Embedded scripting language designed from to directly target C++17.
    *   🎉 [GameMonkey Script (⭐154)](https://github.com/publicrepo/gmscript) - Embedded scripting language for apps, tools and games.
    *   🎉 [v8 (⭐24k)](https://github.com/v8/v8) - High-performance JavaScript and WebAssembly engine by *Google*.

### Libraries / C#

*   C#: Game Framework
    *   🎉 [FNA (⭐2.8k)](https://github.com/FNA-XNA/FNA) - Reimplementation of the Microsoft XNA Game Studio 4.0 libraries.
    *   🎉 [Monofoxe (⭐435)](https://github.com/Martenfur/Monofoxe) - Game engine designed to simplify working with *MonoGame*.
    *   🎉 [MonoGame (⭐12k)](https://github.com/MonoGame/MonoGame) 🔥 - Framework for creating cross-platform games. \[[Website](https://www.monogame.net/)]
    *   🎉 [Nez (⭐1.9k)](https://github.com/prime31/Nez) - Feature-rich 2D framework built on *MonoGame*.
    *   🎉 [Protogame (⭐180)](https://github.com/RedpointGames/Protogame) - Cross-platform 2D/3D game engine built on *MonoGame*.
*   C#: Physics
    *   🎉 [Aether Physics (⭐378)](https://github.com/tainicom/Aether.Physics2D) - 2D physics library with continuous collision detection.
    *   🎉 [Box2D.NET (⭐58)](https://github.com/ikpil/Box2D.NET) - C# port of Box2D. 2D physics engine for games, .NET C#, Unity3D, servers.
    *   🎉 [Velcro Physics (⭐705)](https://github.com/Genbox/VelcroPhysics) - C# port of Box2D. Formerly *Farseer Physics*.

### Libraries / Dart

*   Dart: App Framework
    *   🎉 [Flutter](https://flutter.dev) - Open source app framework by *Google*. \[[Awesome (⭐56k)](https://github.com/Solido/awesome-flutter) | [GitHub](https://github.com/flutter)]

### Libraries / Haxe

*   Haxe: Gui
    *   🎉 [HaxeUI (⭐366)](https://github.com/haxeui/haxeui-core) - Cross-platform set of styleable gui components.
    *   🎉 [Zui (⭐318)](https://github.com/armory3d/zui) - Immediate mode user interface, used in *ArmorPaint*.

### Libraries / JavaScript

*   JavaScript: Game Framework
    *   🎉 [Crafty (⭐3.5k)](https://github.com/craftyjs/Crafty) - Create 2D games in a structured way.
    *   🎉 [Excalibur (⭐2k)](https://github.com/excaliburjs/Excalibur) - Friendly TypeScript 2D game engine for the web.
    *   🎉 [Galacean (⭐5k)](https://github.com/galacean/engine) - Web/Mobile-first engine built on WebGL and glTF.
    *   🎉 [Kaboom (⭐2.7k)](https://github.com/replit/kaboom) - Simple 2D framework.
    *   🎉 [LittleJS (⭐3.7k)](https://github.com/KilledByAPixel/LittleJS) - Lightweight 2D framework with WebGL rendering.
    *   🎉 [Meep (⭐276)](https://github.com/Usnul/meep) - ECS game framework.
    *   🎉 [Oasis (⭐5k)](https://github.com/ant-galaxy/oasis-engine) - WebGL framework by *AntGroup*. 2D/3D, animation, physics.
    *   🎉 [Phaser (⭐38k)](https://github.com/photonstorm/phaser) - Fast 2D game framework. \[[Website](https://phaser.io)]
    *   🎉 [Turbulenz (⭐4.7k)](https://github.com/turbulenz/turbulenz_engine) - Modular 2D/3D game framework for browsers, desktops and mobile.
    *   🎉 [WhitestormJS (⭐6.2k)](https://github.com/WhitestormJS/whs.js) - Framework for 3D apps / games, built on *Three.js*.

### Libraries / Ruby

*   Ruby: Graphics - 3D
    *   🎉 [Mittsu (⭐535)](https://github.com/danini-the-panini/mittsu) - 3D graphics library based heavily on *Three.js*.

### Libraries / Rust

*   Rust: Game Engine w/Editor
    *   🎉 [Fyrox (⭐8.4k)](https://github.com/FyroxEngine/Fyrox) - 2D/3D game engine with editor. Formerly *Rg3d*. \[[Website](https://fyrox.rs/)]
*   Rust: Gui
    *   🔒 [Azul (⭐6k)](https://github.com/fschutt/azul) - Desktop gui framework.
    *   🎉 [Dioxus (⭐29k)](https://github.com/dioxuslabs/dioxus) - Cross-platform, React-like gui library.
    *   🎉 [Druid (⭐9.7k)](https://github.com/linebender/druid) - Data-first gui design toolkit.
    *   🎉 [egui (⭐26k)](https://github.com/emilk/egui) - Easy to use immediate mode gui. Runs on web and native. \[[Demo](https://www.egui.rs/)]
    *   🔒 [Slint (⭐20k)](https://github.com/slint-ui/slint) - Gui toolkit for embedded / desktop. Formerly *SixtyFPS*. \[[Website](https://slint-ui.com/)]

### Open Source Games / C

*   🔒 [Doom (⭐17k)](https://github.com/id-Software/DOOM) - The original 1993 3D masterpiece by *id Software*.

### Open Source Games / C++

*   🎉 [Etheral Legends (⭐245)](https://github.com/Soverance/EtherealLegends) - Indie Action RPG built with *Unreal Engine 4*. \[[Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/428980/Ethereal_Legends/)]

### Specialty Topics / Lighting / Shadows

*   Lighting 3D
    *   📚 [Basic Lighting](https://learnopengl.com/Lighting/Basic-Lighting) - 3D lighting article by *LearnOpenGL*.
    *   📚 [Forward Rendering vs. Deferred Rendering](https://gamedevelopment.tutsplus.com/articles/forward-rendering-vs-deferred-rendering--gamedev-12342) - Techniques for handling many lights.
    *   📚 [Forward+ Rendering / Tiled Forward Shading](https://www.3dgep.com/forward-plus/) - Forward rendering with tiled light culling.

### Specialty Topics / Physics

*   📚 [Fix Your Timestep!](https://gafferongames.com/post/fix_your_timestep/) 🔥 - How to keep physics stable with variable fps.

### Specialty Topics / Shaders

*   📚 [3D Game Shaders For Beginners](https://lettier.github.io/3d-game-shaders-for-beginners/index.html) 🔥 - Shaders to improve your games. \[[Source (⭐19k)](https://github.com/lettier/3d-game-shaders-for-beginners)]
*   📚 [Book of Shaders](https://thebookofshaders.com) 🔥 - Step-by-step guide through [Fragment Shaders](https://www.khronos.org/opengl/wiki/Fragment_Shader). \[[Source (⭐6.4k)](https://github.com/patriciogonzalezvivo/thebookofshaders)]

### Tools / Software / Animation Software

*   💸 [Mixamo](https://www.mixamo.com/#/) - Animate 3D characters for games, films and more. By *Adobe*.

### Tools / Software / Modeling Tools

*   🆓 [Blender](https://www.blender.org) 🔥 - Standard for open source 3D modeling. \[[Source (⭐16k)](https://github.com/blender/blender)]

### Video Game Assets / Graphic Assets

*   🆓 [Kenny](https://www.kenney.nl/assets) 🔥 - 2D/3D CC0 1.0 game graphics and other assets.
items.content_html:
Game Engines / Popular

  • 🎉 Godot (⭐99k) 🔥 - Feature-packed, open source engine. Excellent! [Awesome (⭐8.2k) | Website]

Game Engines / AAA

  • 🎉 Amazon Lumberyard (⭐2.1k) - AAA engine integrated with AWS and Twitch. Forked from CRYENGINE.
  • 💸 CRYENGINE - Powerful real-time game development platform by Crytek.
  • 🆓 Evergine - High-quality 3D and 2D solutions. Formerly Wave Engine. [Samples (⭐130)]
  • 🎉 O3DE (⭐8.4k) - Multi-platform AAA engine. Cinema-quality 3D. Successor to Lumberyard.

Game Engines / Commercial

  • 💰 AppGameKit - Easy and quick game making by TheGameCreators.
  • 💰 Corgi Engine - 2D/2.5D platformer engine built on top of Unity.
  • 🎉 Defold (⭐5.3k) - Open sourced game engine by King. [Website]
  • 💸 Felgo - Build cross-platform 2D games in days, built with Qt.
  • 💰 GameGuru - Game builder, 3D, no coding required by TheGameCreators.
  • 💸 GameMaker Studio - Popular 2D game development environment by YoYo Games.
  • 💰 Phaser Editor 2D - Commercial, web-based editor for Phaser. [GitHub (⭐467)]

Game Engines / Specialty

  • 💰 3dSen - Emulator that lets you play NES games in 3D. [Website]
  • 🎉 GB Studio (⭐8.9k) - Retro adventure game creator for Game Boy.
  • 💰 Platforming Engine - Everything you need to create your own platformer in GameMaker.
  • 💰 RPG in a Box - Turn your stories and ideas into games, built with Godot.

Learning / Computer Graphics

  • Platform: XNA
    • 📚 RB Whitaker's Wiki - Tutorials on C#, MonoGame, XNA, and more.
    • 📚 Riemer's MonoGame Tutorials (⭐765) - Everything you need to start programming with MonoGame.
    • 📚 XNA Game Studio Archive (⭐765) 🔥 - Required visit for MonoGame / FNA / XNA developers.

Libraries / BASIC

  • BASIC: App Framework
    • 💰 Basic for Qt - BASIC language and environment built with Qt. Formerly Q7Basic.
    • 🎉 QB64 (⭐688) - Modern BASIC+OpenGL language, retains QBasic / QB4.5 compatibility.
    • 📚 Visual Basic - Object-oriented language for Windows by Microsoft.

Libraries / C

  • C: App Framework
    • 🎉 glfw (⭐14k) - Cross-platform API for windowing, graphics contexts, input and events.
    • 🎉 MiniFB (⭐1.1k) - Creates a cross-platform frame buffer for drawing pixels.
    • 🎉 SDL (⭐13k) 🔥 - Low level access to audio, keyboard, mouse, joystick, and graphics hardware.
    • 🎉 Sokol (⭐8.4k) 🔥 - Single-file libraries for graphics, windowing, file handling, audio and more.
  • C: Audio
    • ⭐ Miniaudio (⭐4.8k) - Single-file audio playback and capture library.
    • 🎉 SDL_mixer (⭐532) - Audio mixer that supports various file formats for SDL.
    • 🎉 SoLoud (⭐2k) 🔥 - Free, easy, portable audio engine for games.
  • C: Game Framework
    • 🎉 CGL (⭐441) - Single-header file, lots of graphics & utility functions.
    • 🎉 DOME (⭐482) - Melds SDL2 and the Wren scripting language. [Website]
    • 🎉 Entrypoint (⭐71) - Lightweight entry point for games.
    • ⭐ FWK (⭐517) - 3D game framework.
    • 🎉 Gunslinger (⭐1.4k) - Header-only C99 framework for multimedia apps.
    • 🎉 RayLib (⭐27k) 🔥 - Simple and easy-to-use library to enjoy 2D/3D videogame programming.
  • C: Libraries
    • ⭐ Cute Headers (⭐4.7k) - Single-file libraries primarily used for games, by Randy Gaul.
    • ⭐ Libs (⭐1.9k) - Single-file public domain libraries for C/C++, by Mattias Gustavsson.
    • ⭐ Pico Headers (⭐383) - Single-file, cross-platform libraries for game development.
    • 📚 Single-file Libs (⭐9.4k) - Amazing collection of single-file C/C++ libraries compiled from many authors.
    • ⭐ stb (⭐29k) 🔥 - Single-file public domain libraries for C/C++, by Sean Barrett.

Libraries / C++

  • 📚 Learn C++ 🔥 - Walks you through all the steps to write, compile, and debug C++.
  • C++: App Framework
    • 🎉 Cinder (⭐5.4k) - App / graphics library for macOS, Windows, Linux, iOS. [Website]
    • 🎉 Cross Window (⭐686) - Platform library for managing windows and other OS tasks.
    • 🎉 SFML (⭐11k) 🔥 - Cross-platform access to windowing, graphics, audio and networking.
  • C++: Layout
    • 🎉 Yoga (⭐18k) - Cross-platform flexbox layout engine by Facebook. [Website]
  • C++: Scripting
    • 🎉 AngelScript - Cross-platform scripting library, follows the widely known syntax of C/C++.
    • 🔒 ArkScript (⭐648) - Small, fast, functional and scripting language.
    • 🎉 ChaiScript (⭐3k) - Embedded scripting language designed from to directly target C++17.
    • 🎉 GameMonkey Script (⭐154) - Embedded scripting language for apps, tools and games.
    • 🎉 v8 (⭐24k) - High-performance JavaScript and WebAssembly engine by Google.

Libraries / C#

  • C#: Game Framework
    • 🎉 FNA (⭐2.8k) - Reimplementation of the Microsoft XNA Game Studio 4.0 libraries.
    • 🎉 Monofoxe (⭐435) - Game engine designed to simplify working with MonoGame.
    • 🎉 MonoGame (⭐12k) 🔥 - Framework for creating cross-platform games. [Website]
    • 🎉 Nez (⭐1.9k) - Feature-rich 2D framework built on MonoGame.
    • 🎉 Protogame (⭐180) - Cross-platform 2D/3D game engine built on MonoGame.
  • C#: Physics
    • 🎉 Aether Physics (⭐378) - 2D physics library with continuous collision detection.
    • 🎉 Box2D.NET (⭐58) - C# port of Box2D. 2D physics engine for games, .NET C#, Unity3D, servers.
    • 🎉 Velcro Physics (⭐705) - C# port of Box2D. Formerly Farseer Physics.

Libraries / Dart

  • Dart: App Framework
    • 🎉 Flutter - Open source app framework by Google. [Awesome (⭐56k) | GitHub]

Libraries / Haxe

  • Haxe: Gui
    • 🎉 HaxeUI (⭐366) - Cross-platform set of styleable gui components.
    • 🎉 Zui (⭐318) - Immediate mode user interface, used in ArmorPaint.

Libraries / JavaScript

  • JavaScript: Game Framework
    • 🎉 Crafty (⭐3.5k) - Create 2D games in a structured way.
    • 🎉 Excalibur (⭐2k) - Friendly TypeScript 2D game engine for the web.
    • 🎉 Galacean (⭐5k) - Web/Mobile-first engine built on WebGL and glTF.
    • 🎉 Kaboom (⭐2.7k) - Simple 2D framework.
    • 🎉 LittleJS (⭐3.7k) - Lightweight 2D framework with WebGL rendering.
    • 🎉 Meep (⭐276) - ECS game framework.
    • 🎉 Oasis (⭐5k) - WebGL framework by AntGroup. 2D/3D, animation, physics.
    • 🎉 Phaser (⭐38k) - Fast 2D game framework. [Website]
    • 🎉 Turbulenz (⭐4.7k) - Modular 2D/3D game framework for browsers, desktops and mobile.
    • 🎉 WhitestormJS (⭐6.2k) - Framework for 3D apps / games, built on Three.js.

Libraries / Ruby

  • Ruby: Graphics - 3D
    • 🎉 Mittsu (⭐535) - 3D graphics library based heavily on Three.js.

Libraries / Rust

  • Rust: Game Engine w/Editor
    • 🎉 Fyrox (⭐8.4k) - 2D/3D game engine with editor. Formerly Rg3d. [Website]
  • Rust: Gui
    • 🔒 Azul (⭐6k) - Desktop gui framework.
    • 🎉 Dioxus (⭐29k) - Cross-platform, React-like gui library.
    • 🎉 Druid (⭐9.7k) - Data-first gui design toolkit.
    • 🎉 egui (⭐26k) - Easy to use immediate mode gui. Runs on web and native. [Demo]
    • 🔒 Slint (⭐20k) - Gui toolkit for embedded / desktop. Formerly SixtyFPS. [Website]

Open Source Games / C

  • 🔒 Doom (⭐17k) - The original 1993 3D masterpiece by id Software.

Open Source Games / C++

  • 🎉 Etheral Legends (⭐245) - Indie Action RPG built with Unreal Engine 4. [Steam]

Specialty Topics / Lighting / Shadows

  • Lighting 3D
    • 📚 Basic Lighting - 3D lighting article by LearnOpenGL.
    • 📚 Forward Rendering vs. Deferred Rendering - Techniques for handling many lights.
    • 📚 Forward+ Rendering / Tiled Forward Shading - Forward rendering with tiled light culling.

Specialty Topics / Physics

  • 📚 Fix Your Timestep! 🔥 - How to keep physics stable with variable fps.

Specialty Topics / Shaders

  • 📚 3D Game Shaders For Beginners 🔥 - Shaders to improve your games. [Source (⭐19k)]
  • 📚 Book of Shaders 🔥 - Step-by-step guide through Fragment Shaders. [Source (⭐6.4k)]

Tools / Software / Animation Software

  • 💸 Mixamo - Animate 3D characters for games, films and more. By Adobe.

Tools / Software / Modeling Tools

  • 🆓 Blender 🔥 - Standard for open source 3D modeling. [Source (⭐16k)]

Video Game Assets / Graphic Assets

  • 🆓 Kenny 🔥 - 2D/3D CC0 1.0 game graphics and other assets.

items.title: Awesome Slack
items.content_text:
### :hammer_and_wrench:   Libraries and SDKs / Python

*   [boltworks (⭐1)](https://github.com/YSaxon/boltworks) - Extensions to Slack's bolt framework: expandable GUIs, easier callbacks, richer CLIs
items.content_html:
🛠️   Libraries and SDKs / Python

  • boltworks (⭐1) - Extensions to Slack's bolt framework: expandable GUIs, easier callbacks, richer CLIs

items.title: Awesome Datascience
items.content_html:

items.title: Awesome Ruby
items.content_text:
### Spreadsheets and Documents

*   [CAXLSX (⭐539)](https://github.com/caxlsx/caxlsx) - A community maintained excel xlsx generation library. [AXLSX (⭐2.6k)](https://github.com/randym/axlsx) - The original.
items.content_html:
Spreadsheets and Documents

  • CAXLSX (⭐539) - A community maintained excel xlsx generation library. AXLSX (⭐2.6k) - The original.

items.title: Awesome Cl
items.content_text:
### Utils / Third-party APIs

*   [Blackbird](https://orthecreedence.github.io/blackbird/) - a Promise implementation for Common Lisp [MIT](https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT).
    *   see also [promise (⭐12)](https://github.com/Shinmera/promise) - a basic promise datastructure, with timeouts. ZLIB.
items.content_html:
Utils / Third-party APIs

  • Blackbird - a Promise implementation for Common Lisp MIT.
    • see also promise (⭐12) - a basic promise datastructure, with timeouts. ZLIB.

items.title: Awesome Generative Deep Art
items.content_text:
### Generative AI history, timelines, maps, and definitions

*   [A Comprehensive Survey of AI-Generated Content (AIGC): A History of Generative AI from GAN to ChatGPT | arxiv](https://arxiv.org/abs/2303.04226)
*   [A Comprehensive Survey on Pretrained Foundation Models: A History from BERT to ChatGPT | arxiv](https://arxiv.org/abs/2302.09419)
items.content_html:
Generative AI history, timelines, maps, and definitions

  • A Comprehensive Survey of AI-Generated Content (AIGC): A History of Generative AI from GAN to ChatGPT | arxiv
  • A Comprehensive Survey on Pretrained Foundation Models: A History from BERT to ChatGPT | arxiv

items.title: Awesome Terraform
items.content_text:
### Providers / Vendor supported providers

*   [terraform-provider-azapi (⭐215)](https://github.com/Azure/terraform-provider-azapi) - Provider for Azure Resource Manager Rest API
*   [terraform-provider-azuredevops (⭐412)](https://github.com/microsoft/terraform-provider-azuredevops) - Provider for Azure DevOps (VSTS).

### Tools / Community providers

*   [aztfexport (⭐1.8k)](https://github.com/Azure/aztfexport) - A tool to bring existing Azure resources under Terraform's management.
items.content_html:
Providers / Vendor supported providers

  • terraform-provider-azapi (⭐215) - Provider for Azure Resource Manager Rest API
  • terraform-provider-azuredevops (⭐412) - Provider for Azure DevOps (VSTS).

Tools / Community providers

  • aztfexport (⭐1.8k) - A tool to bring existing Azure resources under Terraform's management.

items.title: Awesome Nix
items.content_text:
### Command-Line Tools / Discovery

*   [deadnix (⭐610)](https://github.com/astro/deadnix) - Scan Nix files for dead code.

### Programming Languages / Ruby

*   [ruby-nix (⭐137)](https://github.com/sagittaros/ruby-nix) - Generates reproducible ruby/bundler app environment with Nix.
items.content_html:
Command-Line Tools / Discovery

  • deadnix (⭐610) - Scan Nix files for dead code.

Programming Languages / Ruby

  • ruby-nix (⭐137) - Generates reproducible ruby/bundler app environment with Nix.

items.title: Awesome Security
items.content_text:
### Web / Development

*   [Bearer (⭐2.3k)](https://github.com/Bearer/bearer) - Scan code for security risks and vulnerabilities leading to sensitive data exposures.

Web / Development

items.title: Awesome Neovim
items.content_text:
### Editing Support / Diagnostics

*   [echasnovski/mini.nvim#mini.splitjoin (⭐7.5k)](https://github.com/echasnovski/mini.nvim/blob/main/readmes/mini-splitjoin.md) - Module of `mini.nvim` to split and join arguments. Has customizable pre and post hooks. Works inside comments.
items.content_html:
Editing Support / Diagnostics

  • echasnovski/mini.nvim#mini.splitjoin (⭐7.5k) - Module of mini.nvim to split and join arguments. Has customizable pre and post hooks. Works inside comments.

items.title: Awesome Jupyter
items.content_text:
### Hosted Notebook Solutions

*   [Mineo.app](https://mineo.app) - Data Ops platform with Jupyter-compatible notebooks, no code blocks, and support for creating dashboards.
items.content_html:
Hosted Notebook Solutions

  • Mineo.app - Data Ops platform with Jupyter-compatible notebooks, no code blocks, and support for creating dashboards.
